description: Allow Incoming Connections by Port or Application on Windows Firewall
name: Netsh Port or Application Allowed
query: ((process.executable:*\\netsh.exe AND process.command_line:*firewall* AND process.command_line:*add*) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:(*\\netsh.exe\ advfirewall\ firewall\ add\ rule\ name\=Dropbox\ dir\=in\ action\=allow\ \"program\=C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Dropbox\\Client\\Dropbox.exe\"\ enable\=yes\ profile\=Any* OR *\\netsh.exe\ advfirewall\ firewall\ add\ rule\ name\=Dropbox\ dir\=in\ action\=allow\ \"program\=C\:\\Program\ Files\\Dropbox\\Client\\Dropbox.exe\"\ enable\=yes\ profile\=Any*)))))
author: Markus Neis
Sander Wiebing
